parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Intermittent Grabbing or Locking of Brakes
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unpredictable grabbing or locking of the brakes can cause the vehicle to lurch to a stop, increasing the risk of rear-end collisions or accidents, especially in stop-and-go traffic or when following closely behind another vehicle.
symptoms: The brakes grab or lock suddenly
especially at low speeds
causing the vehicle to lurch or skid; the brake pedal feels soft or spongy; the brakes fail to slow down the vehicle as expected; the ABS system fails to engage or disengage properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Failure or Inconsistent Brake Response
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure or inconsistent response of the brakes can cause the vehicle to lose control, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries, especially in emergency braking situations.
symptoms: The brakes fail to engage or respond slowly; the vehicle takes longer than expected to stop; the brake pedal feels soft or spongy; the brakes grab or lock suddenly; the ABS system fails to engage or disengage properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning of the regenerative braking system can cause the vehicle to brake erratically or unpredictably, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The regenerative braking system cycles between 10 and 20% coincident with brake intensity pulsations; the brake pedal feels soft or spongy; the brakes grab or lock suddenly; the vehicle's energy screen displays abnormal regenerative braking behavior.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inaccurate battery range indicator can cause drivers to become stranded, leading to safety risks, especially for elderly or inexperienced drivers.
symptoms: The battery range indicator on the dashboard does not accurately reflect the remaining driving range
leaving drivers uncertain about how far they can travel before running out of charge.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A defective onboard charger can render the vehicle inoperable, causing inconvenience and potential safety risks.
symptoms: The vehicle is unable to recharge
or the charging process is incomplete
leading to reduced driving range or complete loss of power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A corroded battery box can lead to electrical system failures, causing the vehicle to become inoperable and potentially leading to safety risks.
symptoms: The battery box shows signs of severe corrosion
and the mechanic is unable to remove bolts from the case.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Issues with the regenerative braking system can cause the vehicle to pulsate or jerk when applying the brakes, potentially leading to loss of control or accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle pulsates or jerks when applying the brakes at slow speeds
especially when the battery is not fully charged.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake system failure can cause the vehicle to lose control or crash, leading to serious safety risks.
symptoms: The brake system fails
causing the vehicle to move unexpectedly
or the brake pedal becomes soft or unresponsive.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty sensor can cause the airbag system to malfunction, potentially leading to injuries or fatalities in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The passenger-side airbag warning light flashes
indicating a faulty sensor
which may shut off the entire airbag deployment safety system.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the passenger occupancy sensor can cause the passenger airbag to be disabled, which can increase the risk of injury or death in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The passenger airbag is disabled
the airbag warning light is on
the dashboard airbag and general error lights are flashing
the passenger seat occupancy sensor is not functioning
the OBD code B1018 is displayed.
